document.full_text: nene scored 20 points and j. r. smith added all of his 15 in the fourth quarter as the denver nuggets ran away to another win, beating the hawks, 102-87, wednesday night in atlanta.
document.title: n.b.a. roundup: carmelo who? nuggets run record to 9-2 since trading anthony
